DOC.brief_title: Use Loteprednol Contact Lens Intolerance Dryness
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between age 18 inclusive . 2 . Males females 3 . Any race ethnic background 4 . CL history experience intolerance either switch solution lens without satisfactory relief . 5 . Patient generally good & stable overall health . 6 . Patient likely comply study guideline & study visit . 7 . Informed consent sign . 8 . OSDI score 18 high wearing lenses 9 . Unsatisfactory wearing time contact lenses 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Contact lens use day examination . 3 . Corneal ectasia . 4 . Current use Restasis 5 . Intraocular surgery within 6 month ocular laser surgery within 6 month . 6 . Pregnant lactating woman . 7 . Ocular pathology ( include glaucoma cataract ) could impact result and/or place patient risk .
